data.name: Avalanche UK
data.description:
Avalanche UK is a team of parents and adult gamers who've found mutual friendship through Destiny on Xbox One, our goal is to play the games we love with people who share our ethics. While fun is our main goal we also try to help new members rank up and progress as much as we can. So if you're an adult with or without commitments we could be the clan for you.

Website: https://avaclanche.uk
Discord: https://discord.avaclanche.uk

data.name: Dames of Destiny X1 Iris
data.description:
This is an X1 clan for the Dames of Destiny. If you are not yet a member of the Dames, send your request to the group for your console of choice: 

X1-https://www.bungie.net/en/Clan/Detail/844051
360- https://www.bungie.net/en/Clan/Detail/845284
PS4- https://www.bungie.net/en/Clan/Detail/844024
PS3- https://www.bungie.net/en/Clan/Detail/844061

data.name: Destiny Raiders
